text: "When the World Is Running Down, You Make the Best of What's Still Around" is a 1980 song by The Police and is the third track from their third studio album Zenyatta Mondatta. It was remixed in 2000 and went to number 28 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:2000 songs Category:The Police songs Category:Sting (musician) songs
